articles.title: Live updates: Thanksgiving holiday travel kicks off - CNN
articles.description: Millions of Americans are expected to travel ahead of the Thanksgiving holiday. Follow here for weather forecasts and live travel updates.
articles.content:
A potent winter storm will impact pre-Thanksgiving travel for much of the northern tier of the US today and tomorrow.
More than 10 million people in at least nine states from Montana to New York hav… [+1549 chars]
